attributes.action: Make medium and large sized companies publish net carbon emissions data
attributes.additional_details:
This scheme will help bring about the changes envisioned here by the Governor of the Bank of England - Mark Carney. In doing so it will legitimise aspects of capitalism that traditionally have insufficiently considered environment impact as part of the cost of production.
 
https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2019/oct/13/firms-ignoring-climate-crisis-bankrupt-mark-carney-bank-england-governor
attributes.background: Consumers and investors should be empowered to make environmentally ethical choices. A mandatory scheme for companies to publish easily accessible and understandable data relating to their carbon emissions will help make the free market improve human environmental impact by consumer choice.
